name: The King's Dreams: A Wolf in Sheeps Clothing
description:
There was a tension in the camp.
The vision was clear that not all hearts were true.
There was a sacredness to this vision.
The defector was close at hand and known to all.
But he didn't know his own heart or the true extent of his misgivings but the King knew.
You can't overcome such a Spirit with any form of violence or malice.
This was a battle of will.
But the tribal leaders knew of the rift in the midst and the remedy was sure to follow.
A Dream in this instance was not only a dream.
It was a warning.
A crucially important message.
